entities.name: floor
entities.description: The floor is mentioned as the location where the students were caught red-handed. ("when we reached the seventh floor they were running in every direction.")

entities.name: Miss Pa rkinson
entities.description: Miss Pa rkinson is a trustworthy student who helps Harry by checking if the students left anything behind. ("Miss Pa rkinson ran into the Room of Re-quirement for me to see if they ha d left anything behind.")

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being dealt with by Fudge and Dolores. ("The moment I saw Potter’s name on the list, I knew what we were dealing with")

entities.name: Fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who is impressed by Dolores' discovery. ("Excellent," said Fudge, a smile spreading across his face.)

entities.name: Dolores
entities.description: Dolores is a person who discovers the list of names and hands it to Fudge. ("The moment I saw Potter’s name on the list, I knew what we were dealing with")

entities.name: Marietta
entities.description: Marietta is a person who is standing beside Dumbledore. ("He looked up at Dumbledore, who was still standing beside Mari-etta")

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is standing beside Marietta. ("He looked up at Dumbledore, who was still standing beside Mari-etta")

entities.name: Room of Re-quirement
entities.description: The Room of Re-quirement is a location where Miss Pa rkinson checks if the students left anything behind. ("Miss Pa rkinson ran into the Room of Re-quirement for me to see if they ha d left anything behind.")

entities.name: Potter
entities.description: Potter is a person whose name is on the list. ("The moment I saw Potter’s name on the list, I knew what we were dealing with")

relationships.description: Dolores hands over the list of names to Fudge. ("And . . . by thunder . . . He looked up at Dumbledore, who was still standing beside Mari-etta")
Fudge is dealing with Potter. ("The moment I saw Potter’s name on the list, I knew what we were dealing with")
Miss Pa rkinson enters the Room of Re-quirement. ("Miss Pa rkinson ran into the Room of Re-quirement for me to see if they ha d left anything behind.")
